title: U.S. Seeks to Stem Flow of Illegal Aliens and Drugs
body:
Graphic

 

Photo: The United States Border Patrol and Navy Seabees have begun work on reinforcing a seven-mile strip of 
fencing along the border between San Diego and Tijuana, Mexico, in an attempt to stem the flow ofdrugs and 
undocumented immigrants into the United States. A forklift positioned a thick steel "landing mat," used by the 
military to construct temporary airfields, along a portion of the fence. (Reuters)
